name: V_EHI_HNO_LINKED_PATS
description: Placeholder view for HNO EHI data that needs to be marked as both static and dynamic.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINKED_PAT_ID
columns.description: The list of patients (EPT) that this HNO is associated with for Electronic Health Information (EHI) Export

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
